name: Keema Ghotala Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Keema Ghotala Recipe: Mince ½ kg Oil ½ cup Onion 1 cup chopped Ginger garlic paste 2 tbsp Chili powder 2 tsp Turmeric ½ tsp Dhani powder 2 tsp All spice 1 tsp Yogurt ¼ cup Tomatoes 3 chopperized Salt 1½ tsp Roasted and crushed cumin 1 tsp Tomato 1 cut into tiny cubes Green chilies 3 chopped Coriander leaves chopped 3 tbsp Ginger julienne 1 tbsp Eggs 3 beaten
instructions: Heat oil in a wok, fry onion for 5 mins until light golden Add ginger garlic paste with chopperized tomatoes and all the dry masala with mince Fry well, add yogurt, add 1 cup water, cover and cook till meat tender Add beaten egg, mix well. Lastly add chopped tomatoes all spice, chopped greens, ginger julienne. Leave it on dum for 5 mins. Serve with parathas.
